content: in knit blocking soak in cool water with a little wool wash for at least 20 minutes gently roll in a towel and press until damp using blocking wires weave in evenly on the long sides just inside the selvedge stitch edge and pin to desired width pin out the scallops on each end and let the scarf air dry wear and enjoy © 2021 amy odin designer can be contacted at amy c odin@gmail com
